name: Coalescence (enzoGray)
description:
Keyboard controls
  • jump = z or up arrow key
  • move left and right = left and right arrow keys
  • connect with adjacent blocks = x
  Mobile controls
  • jump = o
  • move left and right = left and right
  • connect with adjacent blocks = x
  This is a demo.

If you want to see a full version of this game then clicking the "support this game" button (and donating lot's of money) would certainly help to make that happen. Plus I'll make sure that anyone who donates will get a free copy of the game when and if it comes out.
